column2: "Thanks for coming back so quickly! Now, what kind of sound do these materials make?"

"I see, so if I stretch the skin across this frame and hit it with this rod...
Oh! It's like dripping water!"
"Everyone knows the sound of rain is soothing! Now, I'll need some music that incorporates this... But don't you worry about that! I'll come up with something!"
"Everything is perfect now, thanks to you! Thank you so much!"
